wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Thompson (15 June 1922 – July 1996) is a former professional footballer, who played for Huddersfield Town. He was born in Dewsbury.

link_mentions.page: List of Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players

response: His uncle, Arthur Thompson played for Huddersfield Town between 1946-1949
Arthur Thompson or Art Thompson may refer to:
* Arthur Thompson (English footballer) (1922–1996), English former footballer
* Arthur Thompson (Australian footballer) (1871–1955), Australian rules footballer
